com.bruceslawson.ratelimiter

Class RateLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bruceslawson.ratelimiter.RateLimiter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RateLimiterMemcache

    public abstract class RateLimiter
extends java.lang.Object
    Base abstract class for all rate limiters. Provides basic functionality for implementing
    Author:
    Bruce Slawson <bruce@bruceslawson.com>

    • Constructor Detail

      • RateLimiter

        public RateLimiter(long rateLimit,
           long ratePeriodSeconds,
           int numberOfSlices,
           boolean isDebug)
        Construct the rate limiter.
        Parameters:
        rateLimit - The count limit allowed in ratePeriodSeconds time.
        ratePeriodSeconds - The rolling period of time.
        numberOfSlices - The granularity of time within ratePeriodSeconds.
        isDebug - Set debugging messages on or off.

      • isLimited

        public abstract boolean isLimited(java.lang.String limiterKey,
                int count)
        Checks to see if key is over limit. Increments the key by count before doing the check. Zero count means no increment.
        Parameters:
        limiterKey - The unique key
        count - The amount to increment by
        Returns:
        Is the key over the limit?
